name: Sazerac
directions: Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe, discarding any excess, and set aside. In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cube and both bitters. Add the rye, fill with ice and stir. Strain into the prepared glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the surface to extract the oils and then discard.

name: Whiskey Smash
ingredients: Half a Lemon, Cut into Wedges
directions: In a shaker, muddle the lemon. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice or one large ice chunk. Slap a mint sprig between your hands and use as garnish. Serve with a straw.

name: Old Fashioned
directions: In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle the bitters, sugar, orange wheel, cherry and a splash of soda. Remove the orange rind, add the bourbon and fill with ice. Garnish with a fresh orange wheel and cherry.

name: Mint Julep
directions: In a Julep cup or rocks glass, lightly muddle the mint and syrup. Add the bourbon and pack tightly with crushed ice. Stir until the cup is frosted on the outside. Top with more crushed ice to form an ice dome and garnish with a few drops of bitters, if desired, and a mint sprig.

name: Manhattan
directions: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Kumquat Smash
directions: In a shaker, muddle the kumquats. Add remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake, and double strain into an Old Fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with two kumquats.

name: The Celfie
directions: Add cardamom pod and cucumber wheel to a shaker and muddle. Add remaining ingredients (except for the soda) and fill with ice. Shake, and double strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with soda water, leaving room for garnish.Make a small, lengthwise cut in the half celery stalk and place on the rim of the cocktail. Slap the remaining mint sprigs on the palm of your hand to release the aromas and use them to garnish the drink.

name: The Joy Division
directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Classic Bijou
directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: El Chapo
directions: Add the gin and aperitif to an Old Fashioned glass over fresh ice. Top with grapefruit beer. Garnish with a slice of fresh strawberry.

name: Black & Ginger
directions: Add the rum to a rocks glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale and bitters and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: The Black Key
directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and shake (without ice) for 10 to 15 seconds. Add ice ans shake again for 30 to 45 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass over a large piece of ice and garnish with a lemon peel and maraschino cherry.

name: Cacao Old Fashioned
directions: In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle the sugar, bitters, and a splash of club soda. Fill with ice and add the rum. Stir. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Mojito
directions: In a shaker, lightly muddle the mint. Add the simple syrup, lime juice, and rum. Fill with ice. Shake well and pour (unstrained) into a highball glass. Top with club soda and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
directions: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and black cherry on a skewer.

name: Alma Blanca
directions: In a shaker, muddle the corn kernels. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a hibiscus-rose, salt-rimmed couple glass. Mist with two to three sprays of Anise-Flavored Liqueur.

name: House of Friends
directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: White Dragon
directions: Add all the ingredients to a shaker. Shake without ice. Fill with ice and shake again. Strain into coupe glass. Twist a swatch of orange peel over the drink and discard.

name: Paloma
directions: Combine the tequila, lime juice, and salt in a tall glass. Add ice and top off with the grapefruit soda. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Wild Strawberry Amero
directions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Taylored Black Russian
directions: Heat the chocolate syrup until warm. Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and stir. Fill with and stir until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

name: Weekend Getaway
directions: In a shaker, briefly muddle the basil leaves. Add remaining ingredients(besides club soda) to a shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and garnish with a basil leaf.

name: Hubble's Law
ingredients: .5 oz Brown Sugar Syrup(1:1 Brown Sugar/Water
directions: Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Falken's Maze
directions: Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake. Strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Moscow Mule
directions: Add the vodka, lime juice, and ginger syrup to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake. Strain into a mule mug or collins glass filled with fresh ice. Top with club soda and mound crushed ice over the top of the drink.
